      • convertToAddress

        public static String convertToAddress(byte[] data)
        Conversion of a byte array data into bitcoin address. Adds 1 byte for version in front of the data. Version is 'zero', as used in the bitcoin mainnet.
        Parameters:
        data - an array of bytes to convert
        Returns:
        a string for bitcoin address

      • convertToAddress

        public static String convertToAddress(String data)
        See convertToAddress(byte[])

      • convertToPrivate

        public static BigInteger convertToPrivate(byte[] data)
        Conversion of a byte array data into private key.
        Parameters:
        data - an array of bytes to convert
        Returns:
        a private key in the form of an integer
